basics.name: Cristobal Andres Manzano Martinez
basics.label: Product Designer | UX/UI Designer | Front-end Developer
basics.summary: +7 years of experience in the design and IT industries, I have built a solid foundation in product design, UX/UI, and front-end development. My expertise in UX/UI is demonstrated through my creation of intuitive and visually appealing interfaces. This expertise is underpinned by a strong understanding of user-centered design and human-computer interaction principles. As a result, I design products that not only captivate visually but also excel in functionality and user experience. My collaborative leadership style and clear communication skills enable me to effectively manage projects and lead teams to success. I am confident in my ability to deliver innovative solutions that bring significant value to any organization.

work.name: Zanozano
work.summary: Streamer de programación más visto en Español en Twitch. +1 millón de seguidores entre todas mis redes sociales. Reconocido por Google, Microsoft y GitHub por mi impacto en la comunidad de desarrolladores.

work.name: Morphosis
work.summary: My role in the company is focused on UX/UI design products using agile methodologies, creating user persona, user journey, benchmarking, and A/B testing. Currently, I am in charge of a Drilling project, developing the accessibility of a Cloud platform. Additionally, I am participating in improving a design kit to enhance the company's design process.

work.name: AmericanScrew
work.summary: Desarrollé una plataforma de noticias geolocalizadas y una API para consumir la información. Escalé los servicios para soportar la carga de más de cientos de miles de peticiones al día. Recorté los tiempos de entrega y despliegues a producción a la mitad. Colaboré con Mozilla y Telefónica para desarrollar la primera app para televisores con FirefoxOS.

work.name: Hackmonkeys
work.summary: My role in the company was focused on UX research using agile methodologies, creating user persona, user journey, benchmarking, and A/B testing. Additionally, I was in charge of the UI for different projects like wireframes, mockups, and low-high prototyping using Figma and Adobe XD. On the other hand, I am responsible for front-end projects using JavaScript, React.Js, MUI, and material design as good practices.

work.name: Ballena Submarina
work.summary: My role in the company was focused on creating products from wood and acrylic using CNC laser technology. The products are based on our illustrations as a handmade process and then cut by a CNC laser to make them accessories. On the other hand, I am in charge of developing the branding, marketing, designing, and control processing. Furthermore, I maintain social networks as a community manager.

work.name: Wisegrowth Start-up
work.summary: My role in the startup was focused on researching and finding insight to help the development of a product based on farming growth automatization using techniques like design thinking and agile process, testing different shapes of the design product. Finally, a physical prototype and mobile application were made by the team. On the other hand, I was in charge of creating the packaging.

work.name: University of Chile
work.summary: My role in the university was focused on teaching rendering in 3DsMax with VRay and the basic notion of Unreal Engine to 3rd-year students in Graphic and Industrial Design. I taught different design concepts to forty students, such as composition, color theory, rendering, poly modeling, and photo editing with PSD.

work.name: B&V Ingeniería

On the one hand, I was focused on developing the corporative image and managing the social networks and website of the company. On the other hand, I led an engineering team through agile methodologies, making different products using benchmarking to get insight into the user's pain points.
